website_summaries.verdict: The easy way to mix a large batch of formula simply and quickly without paying a lot of money for more advanced devices.
pros: Designed to mix a large batch of formula in one setting
Will prepare around four bottles at the same time
The included mixing blade is easy to spin to get the formula powder completely mixed without any clumps
cons: Pitcher handle is too narrow to comfortably hold for larger hands

customer_reviews.title: Much faster than individual bottles!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little intimidating at first when putting it back together after washing it and the directions are not great. But after using it and seeing how much time I saved by doing a big batch instead of individual bottles, I’m sold! I definitely recommend to parents that are wanting a simpler and faster way to make formula. Every time I purchase something online, I always check the reviews. I count on others to help me choose the best option. My reviews are always my honest opinion and I try to include photos if possible. If my review has helped you, please click the "helpful" button below, and if you have any questions feel free to ask! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: DianaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good for breastmilk as well
customer_reviews.text: I use this pitcher for pumped breastmilk. I exclusively pump for my son and this makes bottle washing a little easier! As I pump throughout the day, I just add all extra milk that doesn't go to his next bottle into the pitcher. The next morning, I bag all the milk in the pitcher to be frozen and fill it back up with the current days breastmilk. This has cut down on my morning bottle washing so much! It's also very easy to prep bottles for the day right out of the pitcher. The mixer portion mixes the fat layer back into the milk very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: When it worked it was awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The tiny ball that holds the mixer to the handle broke off the 3rd time I used it. I tried to contact Dr. Brown and they said I must have misused the product. The mixer worked wonderful for the first 2 times it was very easy to clean, it was very easy to store, and AWESOME to make a whole days worth of formula at a time instead of bottle by bottle. It is just a poor design all together. I love Dr. Brown bottles and will never use anything but them. I have bought the bottles since this broke, but this item... Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Branham

customer_reviews.title: A must have item if your baby's formula clumps a lot!!
customer_reviews.text: This Dr. Brown's formula mixing pitcher is a lifesaver! My baby takes Gerber Goodstart Soothe formula, which clumps like crazy. I've tried shaking it, swirling it, mixing with a spoon, different water temperatures etc. and nothing works as well as the Dr. Brown's formula mixing pitcher. I am able to get smooth, clump-free formula every time. I make a batch up and pour it into bottles and store in the fridge until my baby is ready to eat. It is easy to clean, easy to use, and I don't know what I'd do without it!
customer_reviews.author: Grosse Pointe MomTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I love this! You don't have to love Dr Browns ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! You don't have to love Dr Browns other products to love this little pitcher. Your baby will love the smooth well mixed formula. I am a former NICU nurse and it was very important to not shake the formula for the babies to had to have formula. Shaking creates micro bubbles that enter their GI tract when they drink it. This pitcher eliminates that! It's wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Foxymama

customer_reviews.title: Plastic particles!! Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic particles comes off as you make the mix. You will feed your infant plastic particle as soon as you use this. The shaft and lid should be better quality plastic or high quality stainless metal. See photo. I'm returning it after 1 use just wasted 32oz of formula!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dong Y. Lee

customer_reviews.title: A plastic piece melted - DO NOT USE
customer_reviews.text: We have only been using the product for 3 weeks for our newborn and we have two of them so we can always have a pitcher ready. We clean the product as recommended and we woke up this morning and realized the top handle part which connects to the plunger melted. I know they say this is BPA free and stuff, but the fact that this happened causes me serious concern and would definitely not recommend this product for kids. We now need to explore other options.
customer_reviews.author: Yuhui Wang

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I can finally mix Gerber Soothe formula without lumps! That might have warranted a higher rating except for some design flaws. The pitcher is made to come apart for easy cleaning. However, sometimes it comes apart during use (i.e. the handle comes off). The licking ring that is supposed to keep the mixing blade below the level of the liquid is a joke. It doesn’t lock, but moves pretty freely and is worthless. I just watch to make sure I keep it below the liquid. When making a full pitcher, I get some leakage out of the lock-on lid. All that said, it actually does the job on a formula brand that clumps terribly any other way I’ve mixed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was really hopeful that this would be the ticket to helping to minimize my daughters' colic/gasiness. Well, I was severely disappointed. Despite following the directions and multiple speeds of mixing, the formula NEVER dissolved into the water. This was not worth the $10 I spent - my pitcher and whisk works so much better than this product ever will.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki B

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Mixer
customer_reviews.text: This mixer is TERRIBLE. I bought the Munchkin pitcher also, and it's SO MUCH BETTER! The Munchkin's mixing mechanism is so much smoother. They just do not compare. The Dr. Brown pitcher is just cheaply constructed. If it wasn't a hassle, I'd just return this one. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Baylea Sorto

customer_reviews.title: convenient
customer_reviews.text: Okay so having a pitcher is super convenient but I will say that the capacity of this pitcher is 40oz but there's no way you can make that much. I usually make 32oz and by the time you add the formula powder and mix its overflowing a little and making a mess. I would also recommend trying to add the powder in the middle instead of all on top because it will clump on the mixing component.
customer_reviews.author: Carli Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Mixes those hard to mix sensitive formulas!
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher is absolutely amazing! I have to boil my water first because the sensitive formula I use will notice otherwise. It was so time consuming making a bottle 30 minutes ahead of time just to make sure it cooled in time. And trying to make big batches ahead of time and mixing in the pot never worked well! Now I just measure out the powder and add the water into the pitcher and it mixing super easy! Best buy I have made when it comes to feeding! So convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Aleata Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Did not care for it at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Dr. Brown's and also the Munchkin to try both and see which was better. Go with the Munchkin one! This one is so cheap and the design is not great. The munchkin seems to be made better and mixes everything great.
customer_reviews.author: Camela

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money even with minor glitches
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised for the most part. I read reviews that said it leaked at 32oz. Mine doesn’t but I can see where it might at a greater volume. My one complaint is that the little stopper piece that is supposed to keep the mixing blades from rising above the formula and adding bubbles has already stopped working barely three weeks in. All in all it’s a useful item and I’m glad we bought it. It really makes night time feedings quicker and easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sunrunner719

customer_reviews.title: A NEED for parents who formula feed!
customer_reviews.text: Before I got this, I was mixing my daughter’s daily bottles in the bottles and then dispensing them out in more bottles throughout the day (currently she does 24+ oz a day). I do not know why I never got these before. It makes preparing a large batch so much easier! It has cut down on the amount of bottles I use, I make less of a mess, and it is super easy to clean. It mixes the formula perfectly, no clumps, no bubbles. The only con is the handle comes off way too easily but other than that, I love this product. I ordered 3 of them. If you formula feed, you NEED this!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Short

customer_reviews.title: Someone needs an award for inventing this!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I wish I would have used this with my first baby! I only discovered it with my second child and it is a GAME CHANGER! I've been mixing individual bottles EVERY. SINGLE. NIGHT. But no more! This saves so much time AND it mixes better than doing bottles individually. We use the Enfamil AR for my reflux baby, which is notorious for being hard to mix. But not with this pitcher! The first time I used it I couldn't believe how smooth the formula poured out - no clumps at all! It continues to work perfectly. Would definitely recommend for those using formula!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS BEFORE USING
customer_reviews.text: This mixing pitcher is a great product, great design and good value. I bought it to use for my homemade oat milk which accumulates sediment at the bottom and must be mixed before each pouring. Works great! One word of caution though, especially for those using as it was intended (for baby formula), should you run it through the dishwasher RINSE THOUROUGHLY WITH HOT WATER after the cycle. OR BETTER YET, hand wash in mild soap. I could detect a faint flavor of dishwashing detergent in my milk after being in the container after just a day. Glass is best but with proper cleaning, this one is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Rockin' Robin

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Browns Formula Mixing Pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little pitcher. It is alot smaller than I pictured but it’s really good at mixing the formula with the water and then storing in the fridge for the day or for leaving it with my mother in law to use while I am away from the baby. It definitely leaves the formula less bubbly and very easy to pour into bottles. The first bottle I gave my baby that was mixed from this he drank right away without hesitating. I like to think this pitcher made the difference. We use dr brown bottles with this pitcher as well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this is great!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in I am already in love with it. My daughter needs probiotics and this is great to just make up one oz to make sure she gets her medicine. And then she is a picky eater and sometimes only wants another ounce or maybe two. This gives the option instead of trying to guess how much powder to mix for formula. This smoothness of the milk is great as well, with her stomach issues I could never figure how to mix without getting bubbles in the bottle. This eliminates all those bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upset my sons tummy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4th and final child, thinking it would be a game changer. However, I noticed a very noticeable difference during the first 24 hours including increased gas and fussiness. Just a few hours after mixing, the formula smelled pretty terrible. I know when you let a bottle sit out for a while, it's going to smell but this was still refrigerated and it just smelled off....and I know the formula companies say it can be pre-mixed for 24 hours, but I didn't feel comfortable continuing to give it to my son. It was also a bit difficult to mix as well, it was getting all the formula stuck to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: moka0504

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: I got this to store my babies milk well I formula feed and feed him room temperature milk and it’s works perfectly fine and he eats it all no problems. I bought this and a warmer for no reason..... waste of money I don’t store it premade when I just make a bottle as I need it with the powder only takes a few extra seconds as opposed to sitting and warming cold milk from the fridge..... unless you live in an artic area and room temp is too cold don’t bother with this or a warmer....
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlover28

customer_reviews.title: No more bubbles or clumps - but takes forever to heat
customer_reviews.text: Before this mixer, I was hand mixing the formula and had a ton of bubbles on top and clumps at the end. It's very simple and makes sure your child eats the measured amount and the gas is controlled. However, this takes a really long time to heat in the bottle warmer. So it's not the best solution is your child is yelling at the top of their lungs and you just want to feed them. If you are aware of your child's eating times and can heat this up in advance, the consistency is perfect every time.
customer_reviews.author: Sena

customer_reviews.title: Must have if using formula with Dr. Brown bottles!
customer_reviews.text: My son is formula fed and I was livid for the first 6 weeks of his life when my Dr. Brown bottles just kept on leaking and leaking. Finally another mom told me about the formula pitcher and I've had zero issues since. Apparently mixing formula in the bottles does something with pressure (even though I was mixing bottles without anything in the bottle besides the neck and nipple) and the pressure causes leaks. Also, we make a large batch of formula in the morning and are able to have formula ready all day. It's perfect and I recommend this to all my mom friends now; they love it too!
customer_reviews.author: LeazyEvers

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use, but causes the formula to foam up
customer_reviews.text: This product is great in the sense that it is lightweight and is hand-powered. However, unless I am using it wrong, I have found that the formula foams up after mixing and I end up losing about 1/2 ounce of formula to put in the bottle. I guess I could put it on the fridge afterward and wait for the foam to come down, but the Breeza battery-powered product does not foam up after mixing and I can pour the mixed formula into the bottles immediately after mixing.
customer_reviews.author: JGreenberg

customer_reviews.title: Make life easier and Buy 2
customer_reviews.text: If you formula feed, I recommend buying two of these - that way you don’t have to wash the same pitcher by hand every time you are finished or your 24hrs is up - you can just keep alternating pitchers from the dishwasher after your day’s worth of formula is done. Worth spending the money IMO (we have enough baby bottles to wash as it is). Don’t know if this helped with less bubbles or gas but it’s definitely better than shaking. It’s also quick and I don’t worry about any formula lumps left behind if I was stirring.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Merrill

customer_reviews.title: If your baby attends daycare- this is a must
customer_reviews.text: We literally use this EVERY SINGLE weeknight when making bottles for daycare the next day. It's a powerhouse. We hand wash after (I've heard horror stories of loosing the top handle in the dishwasher and it melting), and it works perfectly. Making making several (large or small) baby bottles ahead of time a breeze. Wish we would have purchased sooner. I don't think I would travel with this. Can store the whole pitcher in the fridge if needed, but we only use to prep bottles the night before.
customer_reviews.author: Dana O

customer_reviews.title: Life & Time Saver!
customer_reviews.text: We were buying the ready to eat formula for our newborn, as it was super convenient! However, we noticed the price was much higher than powder formula, so I researched ways to help with time and what could make things easier and found this! I am so glad I found it! I make 32 ounces of formula per day with boiled water and put it in the fridge to pour as we go. It’s essentially the same as having the ready to eat formula, except you’re taking 5 minutes out of your day to prepare. We love it and definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brigette

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product has been great. We got it to mix our formula and refrigerate it. It really helps get the bubbles out of the bottles and helps with my babies gas. The only problem I have is that the handle on the top broke easily so we had to buy a new one not long after our first one.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Maier

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Life saver. Plastic.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a LIFE SAVER in my house. Weve been using this a little over 3 months but unfortunately it just broke the other day where the handle connects to the mixer. Its just a little plastic ball that holds it. Unfortunatly i will have to buy another one. It could be operator error or a manufacturing error but either way just know this is a week point. In these times we have to be smart with our money but unfortunatly this is something i have to buy again because it gets used in my house so often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They had these 5.5 years ago when I had my first...
customer_reviews.text: I regret not purchasing them. I decided against it because by the time I found them he was drinking so much already. This time around we purchased two, and alternate them. They mix formula like a boss, and if you accidentally knock it over you won’t lose all of the formula. The lid doesn’t seal perfectly, but it locks enough that it only trickles. The sides do get a little scratched up after prolonged use. This can make it a little more difficult to see the measurements. That may be my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Paul and Tina Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: Handle problems
customer_reviews.text: I love using a pitcher, makes life easier and formula is less clumpy and less bubbles. The problem is the handle. The hole is too big and it won’t stay on when mixing. And it gets worse over time. (Only had a couple months) Edit to add- I bought a second one as to have formula while cleaning the other one. The second one does not have the same issue. The handle stays on very well. I suggest not putting that part into the bottle steamer.
customer_reviews.author: New parents

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for first time parents
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a life saver if your baby drinks formula. No more waking up in the middle of the night shaking bottles to make formula from powder. Makes enough to last well through the night and then some, just pour, heat, and go. Get those precious seconds of additional sleep! Very easy to take apart and clean, labels were clear, and best of all top shelf dishwasher safe!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Handle comes off and oz lines are hard to read
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use it for breastmilk storage, but I’m returning it because of 2 things: Maybe I’m just incompetent but the handle kept coming off the stick whenever I would use it. So then the stick would just sink down in the pitcher and I would have to pull the lid off and push it back through to hook it to the handle again. No idea why the handle would need to come off. No benefit to that. Also, really hard to read the Oz lines on the side. I’ll be returning and trying the Munchkin brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to reduce bubbles in formula. The product does what it intends, but it took me a little bit to figure out how to use it. I want really sure where to put the lock. Once I figured it out and used it, I noticed the lock does not stay in place. This caused air bubbles when you pull it out of place. Like someone else mentioned, the pitcher should have colored numbers instead of clear as it’s hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: A must for formula moms!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I've been using this for about 3 months now. And all I can say is if your baby is on formula this is the light at the end of the tunnel. I would dread making individual bottles every night for the next day or accidently run out of bottles and have to scoop and get things every where uggg..those days are over. Please invest in one of these. Makes about 4 to 5 bottles. Ive washed and used it everyday and it's seriously amazing.
customer_reviews.author: India

customer_reviews.title: Total game changer.
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute godsend. I spent so much time making up bottles, then warning them etc that my son would become absolutely irate during the wait. This has changed everything. It is easy and quick, keeps the bubbles out of the formula, eliminates powder spillage since I don't have to mix in a small mouth bottle, and allows me to pour an odd number of ounces. No more guessing at a half scoop, or wasting an ounce of expensive formula because I had to make an extra ounce. Couple this with a bottle warmer or an electric kettle (I have the latter) and the stress reduction is palpable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for Formula Feeding
customer_reviews.text: So I never used enough formula with my first for this to be worth it. But I was exclusive pumping for My second and got pregnant at 6 months post-partum. My supply dropped quickly and drastically and I was suddenly completely feeding formula. Mixing individual bottles was a mission. This allows you to make a days worth at once. It’s a life saver. It’s easy to use and clean. We even use it in our travel trailer without issue. If you are a formula feeding mama don’t wait- get this today! The price is unbeatable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: Hassle free!
customer_reviews.text: Baby was supplanting with formula after the first month. Constantly making bottles became a hassle and there would sometimes be bits of unmixed formula in the bottles. Looked into a formula mixer and came across this DR Browns mixer; already used their bottle products so I guess brand loyalty was there. I really like this mixer, it easily blends the formula. I like to make sure there are no powder chunks left as it can irritate babies stomach so when making 20oz I put half the powder in; mix it well(count to approximately 60). Put the other half in mix again. Then I mix it a third time(I know quirky...whatever). Over all happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: eyob tekle

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This has been a game changer for me. At first I was skeptical at the usefulness of a formula pitcher because making a bottle of formula isn't that complicated or time consuming but after trying this out, I can never go back. Every bottle is consistent and it's easier to measure his intake. I can measure the milk exactly to the oz. It also makes it easy to just refill a bottle if baby decides that he wants more. I can't live without this thing now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps minimize wasting formula
customer_reviews.text: Helps mix formula to the perfect consistency verses hand shaking every bottle. Have a finicky eater? Pour 1.5 ounces if you must instead of screwing with dry measuring the right amount. My son is on a added rice starch formula (very thick) and this helps mix it perfectly and theres never any stray clumps. I like making a pitcher of his formula and it lasting 24 hours in the fridge until I have to make another batch. Is there anything "hard" about making individual bottles? No. Its just nice to do all the "labor" at once, once a day, pour and serve.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Still useful when newborn becomes toddler
customer_reviews.text: I actually got 2 of these furmula mixers because I loved/love them so much! I used them to mix a days worth of formula when my son was an infant but now that he's a toddler they have served for mixing everything from chocolate or strawberry milk in a batch for him and his siblings and cousins to mixing iced lattes to last the day for mommy! I have had them about 3 years now and both still perform as new with regular use and handle going through the dishwasher on top rack perfectly! No warping whatsoever! They are also very easy to hand wash as we have only had a dishwasher for a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Mama to a happy spitter is so grateful!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver! I planned to breastfeed so I didn't register for a baby brezza. I make 24 hours worth of formula in the pitcher and either pour out bottles ahead of time or pour as needed. My babe had acid reflux and spit up EXCESSIVELY but was considered a "happy spitter" so we were to just deal until it went away. Shaking the bottle and having bubbles made the spit up even worse, and this made a significant difference in the amount of spit up! It's stirred well and hardly any bubbles!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie D.

customer_reviews.title: The munchkin one is way better made..
customer_reviews.text: We have the munchkin formula pitcher and needed another one. I use these pitchers for my breastmilk and our other pitcher we were using was terrible. Heard a lot of people rave about this pitcher so we decided to try it. It’s kinda cheap. The lid doesn’t actually screw on, it just a very simple put it on and turn it halfway. The mixing mechanism is very flimsy but at least does mix it. Guess I just expected more from the pitcher after hearing the great reviews about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Quillin

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Practical. A MUST HAVE TIMESAVER!
customer_reviews.text: The ratio of formula to water is 1 scoop to 2 ounces mixing per bottle without having lumps impossible, and took four times as long. I knew being Dr. Brown’s, there had to be a bulk mixing hack with an end result of saving time and no lumps! This is it! The formula website will have ratios. I wrote the bulk ratios on an index card for reference, and taped it to the inside of my kitchen cabinet door. ***** If you really want to save time, premeasure the formula into ziploc bags labeled with the amount of water needed! That’s a real timesaver for us... dump, mix, and pour the bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this!!! I got this when my son was about 2 months old and wish we had it from the start. I will be buying this as a baby gift for any expecting Mom’s that formula feed! My son suffers with a lot of gas and bought this after several people recommended it and I’m so glad I listened. It has minimal air bubbles immediately after mixing. It’s so easy even my husband likes it too! I wouldn’t look any further this is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: hartbeat1118

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have, wish handle attachment was stronger
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic formula mixer and holder. There is no shaking so no bubbles. Which is great for babies that have gas. We do like to stir by hand though because the formula we have clumps easily. It’s spout is perfect for bottles so it’s easy to fill them. After about three months of using it (we filled it up at least twice a day and sterilized it once a day), the knob where the handle attached snapped in half. We did end up buying another one due to the pros of the bottle but the con is the handle can snap off after continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Can't imagine life without it
customer_reviews.text: As the mother of a preemie, I cannot imagine my life without this. It is so convenient to mix up a the whole days bottles at once. For travel, I just got a small lunchbox cooler, ice packs & a Rubbermaid liquid container. Never had the formula spoil. We just quit using this since she turned one and no longer takes bottles. IF we ever have another, it will be one of my first purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Burlison

customer_reviews.title: No bubbles!  No stress!  Just freedom!
customer_reviews.text: If you are making formula at all, but especially in large batches, this is a MUST HAVE! So easy to use and to clean. The whole thing is dishwasher safe. I make my baby’s formula for the day in one large batch, then store this in the fridge and pour bottles from it all day long. This pitcher allows me to measure more accurately than mixing individual bottles, and makes it easier to know that babysitters, etc. are serving up the same “mix” that I am. The design of the mixer removes air bubbles, which is a game changer. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: ErinFenn

customer_reviews.title: Helpful With Minor Flaws
customer_reviews.text: I was able to mix up formula without any problems, but there is a major issue with the pitcher. The plastic of the pitcher is clear, but so are the ounce markers. This means that measuring the water is a pain, but telling how much mixed formula you have left is nearly impossible. It'd be nice if they were marked in black ink. On a side note, its easiest to mix up clump free formula (especially if you're putting in a ton of powder) by adding it all at once. I measure it out into a little container, throw it all in at once and mix right away.
customer_reviews.author: 416B

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I rolled my eyes a little at this - after all, I could just put mix up a batch of formula or store expressed breastmilk in a regular pitcher. But I like it! It's convenient with the measurement markings and easy to use and clean. The size is great for the amount I would need in a day - if you have twins or multiple babies to care for, then you would probably need multiple pitchers. The pitcher lid also stays on securely. My only advice is to purchase on sale, since I think it's a 'nice to have' and not an 'absolutely must have' if the budget is tight.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Almost...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this at first and would have given 4 stars, taking a star off due to the hard to read markings for the measurements. After a few weeks of use the handle won't stay in place when mixing. The ball and socket joint has become too loose, I suppose. Right now I have to sort of jam my thumb in there to try and prevent it from falling out. I am going to look at other possible solutions
customer_reviews.author: Caddy

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t live without it
customer_reviews.text: We would not have survived this year without this $10 item. It has been a life-saver! We use Earth’s Best baby formula (it’s the only one without added corn syrup solids or soy) but it foams up like crazy if you shake it in the bottle! Someone recommended this and now I make all of our baby’s bottles at one time and the formula is perfect after about a minute of stirring. No clumps! For a while I hand washed by filling with soapy water and stirring with the pump, but now we put it in the dishwasher on the top rack with no problem. LOVE this pitcher!!!
customer_reviews.author: CES

customer_reviews.title: #1 MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I ever raised two other kids without this!!! We absolutely HATE mixing formula and trying to get out all the chunks...now that I have a baby with a G-tube who gets fed through a bag, formula chunks are a complete no no. This thing is amazing!!! This has Seriously made my life so much easier and I'm actually mad that I didn't know this existed for my other two littles lol
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly, the Munchkin one is way better
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the wobbly stem. It's like in sections. I don't like how it feels mixing it. We have the Munchkins. Bought this as a spare bc we use the Dr Brown bottles. Threw away the box before trying out so I guess I'm keeping. Mixes well, just, I like the Munchkin much better.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Meloro

customer_reviews.title: Does a Great Job
customer_reviews.text: I got this to have for formula mixing when my granddaughter is visiting. It works very nicely and is easy to use/clean. The only thing keeping me from giving it 5 stars is that the Munchkin brand mixing pitcher has the feature of an adjustable ring around the opening indicating when the formula batch expires—that’s very convenient (my daughter has that one). Overall, it will be put to a lot of use here.
customer_reviews.author: DebS

customer_reviews.title: No clumps, even with cold water
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher is great at mixing formula with no clumps, even if the water has cooled. I bought a second one so there’s always a clean one ready for the next day’s supply of formula. It’s easy to clean, although difficult to sterilize because of its size. (My baby is 9 months now, so I mostly just swish some boiling water in it before making formula now) We are using Similac ProAdvance, and it does get quite frothy, but at least no clumps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper - PL

customer_reviews.title: Time safer!
customer_reviews.text: I have been formula feeding my LO for 8 months and just discovered this. It is amazing and saves so much time. Each night, I use it to quickly mix up all my bottles for the next day. Rather than spending lots of time shaking individual bottles, I save so much time. It was easy to figure out how to use, simple to clean, and nicely pours into bottles. I do always wait a minute or two after mixing to let the foam go down before pouring. Wish I had discovered this months ago!
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: 100% awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is the best $10 I have ever spent! I would spend it again a million times!! My little one had gas real bad and it was from her formula she was on the air bubbles from me shaking her bottles... now with the pitcher we have no bubbles and I can mix up 24 ounces or however much I need and makes fixing bottles so much easier!! If you are looking for something to make your life a little easier with a little one this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Ronk

customer_reviews.title: Makes formula feeding so much easier
customer_reviews.text: When I stopped breastfeeding, making formula bottles seemed like such a hassle, especially in the middle of the night. This has made it so much more convenient. I also like that I can make a batch in the morning before going to work, and when I get home, I know how much he ate during the day (without making my childcare try to keep track). I've never had any issues with keeping it clean, or the formula mixing properly.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Such a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher is a lifesaver!!!! Making each bottle was starting to be a pain so I went online to look for something and boom, found it! This is super easy to use and I make sure to write the time on the lid with a dry erase markers which washes off great with each cleaning. I haven't made a full batch yet because I'd rather not make enough than too much but I think the most we have done is 24 oz at a time and it's awesome! Such a Time saver especially at night feeds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must need for a formula baby!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a baby on formula you need this!! This has been such a life and time saver!! Can’t imagine not having this now!! I make what I know I’ll use in a 24 hour period and keep it in this container in the fridge!! When it is 2am and my son wakes up for a feeding I don’t have to measure any dry powder out with half a eyelid open. I just simply pour and heat up. The Agitator in the middle of the pitcher mixes the formula up so well that I don’t have to worry about chunks being in there at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Elenback

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful
customer_reviews.text: Super helpful. I can perfectly mix and fill all my 4 month old’s bottles for the day/night. I can fill about 5 6 oz bottles with no spills or leakage. (15 hours of bottles!) It’s great because we can wash and sanitize a load of bottles once a day and we (almost) never run out of clean bottles. I wouldn’t think it’s great for travel as it’s bulky and I feel you are anything like my family, on the go. It’s easier to pre-fill her bottles with the measured amount of formula and make them on the spot. No spills, no need to keep them cold, super easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: ShortySmak

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a pitcher to have!
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher has been a blessing! I didnt realize how much I would love using this thing! It's so easy to use. Stirring the formula is so easy and leaves no clumps of formula. The only drawback is when traveling, to a friend's house for instance, it does leak if it falls over or even if it barely tips. It does waste formula and leaves quite a mess. But, for home use, this thing is awesome. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kandy78

customer_reviews.title: Best!
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver. I’ve been mixing the formula in the dr brown bottle with the travel lid that I bought separately each time I feed my baby until I found this product. No more frustration about not having the milk ready when the baby is hungry. I just have to warm the bottle up for a minute when the baby cries and I can hold her until that’s done. Anyway I love this product and no substitutes
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: No clumps and perfect for the whole day!
customer_reviews.text: My baby is a pain and is drinking 3.5oz of formula - she is hungry after 3 but can’t handle the whole 4oz. Since there is no mixing directions for 3.5oz of formula we were making a ounce and pouring 1/2 in to her bottle. When it is 2am and baby is screaming I don’t want to deal with that. This has saved our lives! We can mix enough for an entire day (AND GET ALL THE CLUMPS OUT!!) and feed her exactly how much she likes.
customer_reviews.author: CasRy

customer_reviews.title: Simplified Life!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a new mom and this has pretty much simplified my life!! I was getting so tired of having to keep mixing formula in bottles all day! Now I only have to mix once in the morning and fill bottles for the whole day!! Life made easy!! The quality is good and I haven't experienced any leaks with the locking lid. It's also very easy to clean! I pack this into a lunch box when my baby goes to the babysitters house, but the bag is bigger than this container. It would be helpful if it came with an insulated travel bag. Love the product overall and definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Calik

customer_reviews.title: Makes the day so much easier
customer_reviews.text: You wouldn't think that having a pitcher of premixed formula would make that big of a difference, but it really does! We used to make a bunch of individual bottles, but as I'm sure you know, when you add formula to the water, you get a little bigger of a bottle. So this is perfect. You make it ahead then can pour exact amounts that you want. Best ever when your child is taking an odd number of ounces! Don't have to worry about wasting the extra or making a little less and your babe not being satisfied. We make it when we wake up every morning to last the entire day. Simple as that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 works every time
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first because this product seems a little flimsy at first glance, but we use it every day and it is literally a life-saver in terms of time and convenience. Everything comes apart for easy cleaning, it fits perfectly in the fridge because it isn't huge, and it makes mixing formula so much easier. The formula comes out smooth every single time with minimal effort. Works exactly as described, I would recommend to anyone feeding formula!
customer_reviews.author: kelly crofoot

customer_reviews.title: Easy mixing
customer_reviews.text: This makes for mixing up a large batch of formula very easy. We like to make a day's worth of formula at a time and this makes it easy to mix and sore a bunch at a time, much easier than mixing via shaking. I've also heard of people using this for storage of pumped breastmilk and the mixing feature allows the fat to be remixed in before pouring a bottle. I like how easily it comes apart which is convenient for travel. I stuff clothes inside the pitcher so then it takes up almost no extra space in my suitcase!
customer_reviews.author: Tenley

customer_reviews.title: Not for storing once made
customer_reviews.text: We make a pitcher of formula for a 24 hour period. Our son was getting stomach aches from the bubbles in the bottle that formed from shaking them. This has eliminated that problem. We make a pitcher and have bottles for the next 5 or 6 feedings. 30 ounces of water with 15 scoops of formula makes about 5 six ounce bottles and 1 four ounce bottle. Formula cannot be stored in the pitcher it has to be transferred to bottles according to the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher is a GAME CHANGER for my family. My daughter eats 2/3 formula and 1/3 breast milk due to my low milk production. Before this pitcher, I was using small containers to mix formula, then add breast milk. Mixing took forever and there were always clumps. Fast forward to this pitcher.... Now I mix milk in about 60 seconds. It has also helped to cut down on my daughter's gas issues. One of the best baby items I've purchased since becoming a mom!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Blomquist

customer_reviews.title: Makes newborn life a little bit easier!
customer_reviews.text: Makes life with a newborn on formula 100 times easier! It mixes the formula so quick and now no more clumps and using all our butter knives in a day to stir formula as our baby would be super fussy and gassy if we shook the bottle. We just put some hot water in a mug and set the cold bottle in it for a few minutes to bring it back to room temperature for our daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Great for mixing sensitive formula
customer_reviews.text: My twins use Similac Pro Sensitive formula, which is super "foamy". This was a great purchase for us as it allowed me to mix multiple bottles at the same time and keep in the fridge. My son struggled with puking because of all the air with the formula, but after using this, it was dramatically better. I highly recommend this for everyone, but especially those with multiples who need formula and sensitive formula.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Peters

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver.
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher has been a lifesaver for us. Not only is it convenient, it works really well and we don't get lumps in the formula. The only formula our little one will eat and not spit up terribly is also very foamy if it gets shaken. The pitcher prevents that from happening, as it doesn't introduce much air into the formula, which has helped immensely with our baby's spit up and gas issues. Our baby is clearly happier and suffers less tummy pain because of this product. I'd buy it again and again if I needed to, but I probably won't ever have to because it's also well-made and easy to take apart and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Iliketurtles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for breastmilk mixing!
customer_reviews.text: This was suggested to me through a friend for storing breastmilk in the fridge during the day, and being able to mix it gently enough to mix in all the yummy nutrients for the baby without damaging anything. I won’t be using it for formula since my intentions are to exclusively pump! I will pump, store in fridge, and every other feeding pour the stored bottles into this pitcher and then pour the contents of the pitcher into freezer bags at the end of every day.
customer_reviews.author: momofthree3

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: My 6wk old just had a g-tube placed about a week ago and I felt like I was constantly mixing small batches of formula for his feeding pump all day long. A mom who’s child also had a g-tube recommended this pitcher to make large batches at a time to last all day in the fridge. The pitcher just arrived and I’m already so happy with it and know it will make our lives a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Formula pitcher streamlines milk making process
customer_reviews.text: This formula mixing pitcher definitely gets the job done and makes mixing formula for the day less messy and more convenient. However, in typical true “Dr. Brown’s” fashion, there are a bunch of small parts and I wonder if there was an easier way to construct the pitcher. Also be aware that after adding the powder and mixing you will have “more” than what you started with. So if you want to get the same “4oz” you would as making a one off bottle, you need to pour a little more than 4oz to account for that.
customer_reviews.author: BookWorm123

customer_reviews.title: Mixes great! Fast, no clumps!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this for our newborn’s formula for the last 2 weeks. Mixes quickly, no lumps, dishwasher safe, comes apart easily to clean by hand too. The first 3 months, you should boil the water if using powder formula. This is perfect for making a days worth of bottles in advance. Pout as you need them or mix & pour straight into bottles for later. Later on, you can use it for mixing the frozen juice.
customer_reviews.author: KATE S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convinient
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my second child after using it at my friend's house with her newborn. There are a lot of premade formula options out there, but they are more expensive than the powder formula. This is a handy little gadget to keep in the fridge for daytime feedings. As soon as baby gets fussy, push the handle to give the premixed formula a little stir, pour, heat, ready to go! Easier than trying to scoop powder into the narrow top of a bottle while holding baby. Also doesn't contain the gas causing air bubbles like shaking a bottle to mix the formula. Worthy buy!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Wheaton

customer_reviews.title: No more foamy formula!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this pitcher for a week now and I'm really loving it. I use Plum Organics formula, which would get EXTREMELY foamy when I would shake it, but now with the pitcher it doesn't foam up at all. I even started stirring each bottle instead of shaking, which was ok, but just more time consuming. I love using this pitcher to make all formula for the day ahead of time because it allows the little bit of chunks that don't desolve right away to sit for a while and eventually disappear before preparing the first bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product! I have a 1-month-old and with this pitcher I'm able to make large quantities of formula without having to constantly be boiling water. I can just make a big batch and call it a day! I keep the whole pitcher in the fridge and pour formula as needed throughout the day and night. It's dishwasher safe also which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Makes life a little more simple.
customer_reviews.text: One of the very few products I use on a daily basis for my baby girl. Before this I use to use the regular method of shaking the bottle. That took forever to the clumps to dissolve. This helps mix the formula evenly without worrying about if all the clumps are gone. This is easy to clean, and everything can be removed to clean by hand/dishwasher. It has the oz label on the container, with goes up to 42/46( I believe) which mean less milk to keep making. Its recommend to use all formula by the end of the day. To use it, you just lift the handle at the top then push down to stir. Best thing ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kamry Matthews

customer_reviews.title: It's also a great alternative to manually mixing since both my parents are ...
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this for my father who recently had a stroke. Because he has to thicken his liquids, I figured it would be easier to mix the powder in this pitcher to the proper consistency. Sometimes, he forgets the number of scoops, but the consistency has to be nectar to avoid choking. The pitcher's transparency makes it easier to check the consistency and also keep dad productive physically. It's also a great alternative to manually mixing since both my parents are developing arthritis in their hands. I would definitely order this again and suggest to anyone else looking for a great product to use for baby and elderly care. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: C R

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I used to have the Baby Brezza version of this which SUCKED. The batteries always got wet. I love that this one is battery free. It’s easy to wash and even though there’s six parts it’s not too bad to put together once you understand them. It mixes the formula smoothly with no clumps. So convenient to have a full amount of formula for the whole day.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: There were several recommendations for this pitcher online, so I decided to purchase it. I appreciate the convenience of being able to pour a custom amount of pre-made formula into a bottle when I need it. This helps prevent waste, or having to deal with the formula powder every time my little one eats. The pitcher doesn't take up much space in the refrigerator, and it is easy to clean. My husband likes the convenience of it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Agree with most moms here!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a must have for formula feeding babies. I was worried to switch to powder and was feeding my son with ready to drink similac. Then during covid19 when getting ready to drink bottles were limited, I switched to powder. Was about to get formula maker when I stumbled on this and decided to try. It absolutely reduces the bubbles and my son has not had colic problem with powder(which was my reason to stay with ready to drink). I make 32 Oz every day, as of now it comes for 18 hrs. Thanks to all moms who reviewed this product earlier it helped save money and time for me.
customer_reviews.author: Roshani

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: So helpful! You need this if you are formula feeding. Dont; even bother with one of those silly expensive machines. You need this! Also, there is no reason why your baby needs warm milk.. we make milk, refrigerate it and then give it to our son cold. We have checked with the pediatrician and my friend who is a APN and it is A okay! Ask your doctor about it and see if baby will take cold milk.. its easier and cheaper to use this if they will take it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Warwick

customer_reviews.title: Love it, use it every day!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo was a micro-preemie who left the NICU on formula. This pitcher works amazingly well at mixing and keeping formula from clumping. It makes it very easy to make large batches at a time. Having a baby is full of repetitive tasks. This makes preparing and keeping formula one less issue to deal with. Easy to wash and assemble. Definitely recommend if you’re kiddo is on formula.
customer_reviews.author: voidandshadow

customer_reviews.title: Streamline a day's feedings
customer_reviews.text: This mixer pitcher has streamlined our bottle process. I make exactly what she needs for the day and it's easy easy easy to pour from this pitcher, no spills and much more accurate than from one big bottle as we were doing before. My only complaint would be that maybe this was designed by a left-handed person, because to see the measurements the handle is aligned with the left side. But it makes it convenient to use your right hand to mix with the top handle and hold the pitcher with the left.
customer_reviews.author: W.K.N.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no bubbles in formula
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome!! Talk about time saving. Before I got this, I was mixing formula in the bottle and shaking it which caused a lot of bubbles to form. In turn, it caused my baby to develop a lot of gas which made him bloated and extremely uncomfortable. Now, I use this daily with absolutely no bubbles or clumps. This mixes the formula very well with no bubbles!
customer_reviews.author: momof4boys

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love this product so much. This made some very long nights, run a little smoother. Very convenient and easy to use. Just do NOT fill up all the way. I made that mistake the first time I used it. I bought a few of these. Two for home (I'd fix both in the morning, and it would last me through the day usually), and one for when we visited family. I also bought some for another Momma, bc I love them that much.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Minimized froth/foam on very foamy formula
customer_reviews.text: Love this!. Makes my similac sensitive formula not foam up crazy. I bought it specifically for the that job. It comes out same as the ready to feed version whit almost no foam. Just make sure when misxing you do not go over the water level so its not going to mix air into the formula. There might be a little foam layer on top but as you pour formula to thier bottle the foam sticks to the sides effectively not letting foam to pout out with the formula so Loooooove this thing! Saver for my gassy colicky baby!
customer_reviews.author: Roann V

customer_reviews.title: Great Timesaver
customer_reviews.text: My son and DIL had twins and this pitcher has been a great time saver. She is nursing but supplementing with formula. This pitcher has saved us a lot of time mixing/storing formula, especially for those middle of the night feedings. The pitcher is small but perfect size to mix and store formula for the day/night. It fits in a microwave sterilizer which also saves time.
customer_reviews.author: D. West

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but not the greatest quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for convenience. It’s very easy to use. Taking it apart, cleaning, and putting it back together is a breeze. The two downsides to this product are 1: the small piece that is meant to go above the mixer attachment to stop it from hitting the lid and coming off does not stay in place, so it does not prevent the attachment from coming off during mixing. 2: If you fill the pitcher more than halfway, unless you mix very slowly, the liquid overflows out of the pitcher. I am incredibly disappointed in the quality of the small attachment. I am keeping the product because of the convenience but I’m not sure if I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, makes life easier!
customer_reviews.text: This is one product I would highly recommend to all formula parents. Originally I thought it was an unnecessary thing to have, but I do think it makes things easier. It helps you mix the formula without any clumps or extra foam. I mix up the next day's formula the night before and let it settle in the fridge overnight. Pouring bottles to send to daycare is super easy, and it's great to have a pitcher made up on the weekends or days we're home and just need to pour out bottles through the day. We bought one for my mom and dad's house, too. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Huge time-saver for formula fed babies & much smoother than mixing single serving bottles!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these if your baby is formula fed. We make a day's worth at a time and put it in the fridge - which allows it to settle and the bubbles to subside. Takes minutes to make a batch, and for this price - as compared to a fancy formula maker - you can't beat it. We bought 3 so we always have a clean one in rotation. I took away one star bc it reads you can fill it up past 32 oz, but I've found after 30 ounces bubbles will leak out of the top while your doing the mixing (not actually during use post mixing).
customer_reviews.author: RobDailey

customer_reviews.title: My Baby can have Formula Again!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were feeding our baby formula but we saw that he was spitting up a lot and throwing up. We switched to ready made formula and he got much better, the only real disadvantage was that it cost a lot more. I heard about this Dr. Browns formula mixer and was really skeptical but I knew Dr. Browns products are honestly very high quality and we use them for his bottles and thats the only one he likes. We finally decided to buy the mixer and it is amazing! Takes away all the bubbles and doesnt make the formula clumpy. Highly reccomend it!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Easy, useful, works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to pre mix my son’s formula to prevent bubbles as he is colicky. It works really well to that end and also it is incredibly convenient to have a days worth of formula made up at once and just pour it into his bottle or bottle insert rather than having to make and shake a bottle right when he is hungry. He ingests less bubbles this way and it also helps me prepare for the night, and/or for outings. It is easy to clean, easy to use. I plan to buy another for my mom who will watch my baby when I return to work.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Amazing formula mixing jug!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver for making formula!! I loved it so much I bought two more so I would always have a clean one handy while the others went through the dishwasher. It is so easy to use and so easy to clean. One of my top ten best baby purchases by far!! I think it could travel nicely, it's not huge, but it's certainly not as small as a couple of ready to feed bottles of formula. Depending on how long you're travelling for though, anymore than a day or two, it would absolutely be better to pack this and some formula.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I recently started using powder formula for my baby. There would always be so many air bubbles upon shaking and mixing the formula. This Dr Browns mixing pitcher is a game changer! So glad I got it. You can prepare a large quantity of formula ahead of time without having to worry about air bubbles or frothiness. Then serve as you please. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: celeste001

product_meta.title: Dr. Brown's Formula Mixing Pitcher
product_meta.description:
Size:1 CountThe formula mixing pitcher from Dr. Brown's eases formula preparation by allowing up to 4 bottles to be mixed and stored at one time. This unique feature includes a mixing blade that quickly dissolves formula with no clumping, and an adjustable stopper that prohibits the mixing blade from lifting above the surface of the liquid as to keep air introduction to a minimum. This features a locking lid, soft grip handle, and ribbed pitcher spout offer comfort and convenience when pouring. It disassembles without difficulty for easy cleaning. This is compact in size, dishwasher safe and is BPA free.
